turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order to a pizza for dinner tonight.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: From which restaurant?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Settebello. The Italian restaurant around the corner.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: DId you want it for delivery or pick-up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Pick-up is fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you have a certain pizza in mind?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Margherita.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: With regular or buffalo mozzarella?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Margherita DOC please!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: My favorite as well!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: But my friend is allergic to tomatoes, so I want it made with red peppers instead.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will ask them to add peppers and NO tomatoes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you want a side or a salad or anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. Just the pizza will be plenty!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Let me find out if they will do the special order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes. They are more than happy to replace the tomatoes with peppers.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The pizza will be ready for pick-up in about 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you need help with anything else right now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. I'm too excited about dinner!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I think I will go get a pizza myself.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ha!
